verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> that came to Micah <WH4318> the Morasthite <WH4183> in the days <WH3117> of Jotham <WH3147>, Ahaz <WH271>, and Hezekiah <WH3169>, kings <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, which he saw <WH2372> concerning Samaria <WH8111> and Jerusalem <WH3389>.

Hear <WH8085>, all ye people <WH5971>; hearken <WH7181>, O earth <WH776>, and all that therein <WH4393> is: and let the Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069> be witness <WH5707> against you, the Lord <WH136> from his holy <WH6944> temple <WH1964>. all ye: Heb. ye people, all of them all that: Heb. the fulness thereof
For, behold, the LORD <WH3068> cometh forth <WH3318> out of his place <WH4725>, and will come down <WH3381>, and tread <WH1869> upon the high places <WH1116> of the earth <WH776>.

And the mountains <WH2022> shall be molten <WH4549> under him, and the valleys <WH6010> shall be cleft <WH1234>, as wax <WH1749> before <WH6440> the fire <WH784>, and as the waters <WH4325> that are poured <WH5064> down a steep place <WH4174>. a steep: Heb. a descent

For the transgression <WH6588> of Jacob <WH3290> is all this, and for the sins <WH2403> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>. What is the transgression <WH6588> of Jacob <WH3290>? is it not Samaria <WH8111>? and what are the high places <WH1116> of Judah <WH3063>? are they not Jerusalem <WH3389>?

Therefore I will make <WH7760> Samaria <WH8111> as an heap <WH5856> of the field <WH7704>, and as plantings <WH4302> of a vineyard <WH3754>: and I will pour down <WH5064> the stones <WH68> thereof into the valley <WH1516>, and I will discover <WH1540> the foundations <WH3247> thereof.

And all the graven images <WH6456> thereof shall be beaten to pieces <WH3807>, and all the hires <WH868> thereof shall be burned <WH8313> with the fire <WH784>, and all the idols <WH6091> thereof will I lay <WH7760> desolate <WH8077>: for she gathered <WH6908> it of the hire <WH868> of an harlot <WH2181>, and they shall return <WH7725> to the hire <WH868> of an harlot <WH2181>.

Therefore I will wail <WH5594> and howl <WH3213>, I will go <WH3212> stripped <WH7758> <WH7758> and naked <WH6174>: I will make <WH6213> a wailing <WH4553> like the dragons <WH8577>, and mourning <WH60> as the owls <WH1323> <WH3284>. owls: Heb. daughters of the owl

For her wound <WH4347> is incurable <WH605>; for it is come <WH935> unto Judah <WH3063>; he is come <WH5060> unto the gate <WH8179> of my people <WH5971>, even to Jerusalem <WH3389>. her: or, she is grievously sick of her wounds
Declare <WH5046> ye it not at Gath <WH1661>, weep <WH1058> ye not at all <WH1058>: in the house of Aphrah <WH1036> roll <WH6428> <WH6428> thyself in the dust <WH6083>. Aphrah: that is, Dust

Pass ye away <WH5674>, thou inhabitant <WH3427> of Saphir <WH8208>, having thy shame <WH1322> naked <WH6181>: the inhabitant <WH3427> of Zaanan <WH6630> came not forth <WH3318> in the mourning <WH4553> of Bethezel <WH1018>; he shall receive <WH3947> of you his standing <WH5979>. thou: or, thou that dwellest fairly inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress Zaanan: or, The country of flocks Bethezel: or, A place near

For the inhabitant <WH3427> of Maroth <WH4796> waited carefully <WH2342> for good <WH2896>: but evil <WH7451> came down <WH3381> from the LORD <WH3068> unto the gate <WH8179> of Jerusalem <WH3389>. inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress waited: or, was grieved

O thou inhabitant <WH3427> of Lachish <WH3923>, bind <WH7573> the chariot <WH4818> to the swift beast <WH7409>: she is the beginning <WH7225> of the sin <WH2403> to the daughter <WH1323> of Zion <WH6726>: for the transgressions <WH6588> of Israel <WH3478> were found <WH4672> in thee. inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress

Therefore shalt thou give <WH5414> presents <WH7964> to Moreshethgath <WH4182>: the houses <WH1004> of Achzib <WH392> shall be a lie <WH391> to the kings <WH4428> of Israel <WH3478>. to: or, for Moreshethgath Achzib: that is, A lie

Yet will I bring <WH935> an heir <WH3423> unto thee, O inhabitant <WH3427> of Mareshah <WH4762>: he shall come <WH935> unto Adullam <WH5725> the glory <WH3519> of Israel <WH3478>. inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress he: or, the glory of Israel shall, etc

Make thee bald <WH7139>, and poll <WH1494> thee for thy delicate <WH8588> children <WH1121>; enlarge <WH7337> thy baldness <WH7144> as the eagle <WH5404>; for they are gone into captivity <WH1540> from thee.
